#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,sum=0,i,n,a[100000],sum1=0;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		sum=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]),sum+=a[i];
		if(sum%n==0){
			sum=sum/n;
			sum1=0;
			for(i=0;i<n;i++){
				if(a[i]>sum) sum1+=a[i]-sum;
				}
				printf("%d\n",2*sum1);
		}
		else
		printf("-1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
